description:
Purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Quebec, QC by desired date of March 1, 2023.

This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Category(ies) of the SA:

Product Category 1 – Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
Product Category 2 – Freestanding Height adjustable desk/tables products

full_summary:
### [Notice of Public Procurement (NPP)](#notice-of-public-procurement-npp)
## [Notice Title](#notice-title)
[Product Category 1 – Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems] and [Product Category 2 – Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products](#product-categories)

## [Procurement Details](#procurement-details)
* [Reference Number](#reference-number): PW-22-01008503
* [Amendment Number](#amendment-number): 3
* [Solicitation Number](#solicitation-number): 30003459
* [Publication Date](#publication-date): September 27, 2022
* [Tender Closing Date](#tender-closing-date): October 20, 2022, 2:00 PM (EDT)
* [Amendment Date](#amendment-date): October 13, 2022
* [Procurement Status](#procurement-status): Expired

## [Procurement Categories and Trade Agreements](#procurement-categories-and-trade-agreements)
This procurement is classified under the following categories:
* [GSIN](#gsin): *N7110* – Office Furniture

The current bid solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* [Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement](#canada-honduras-free-trade-agreement)
* [Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement](#canada-chile-free-trade-agreement)
* [Canadian Free Trade Agreement](#canadian-free-trade-agreement)
* [Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement](#canada-panama-free-trade-agreement)
* [Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement](#canada-colombia-free-trade-agreement)
* [Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement](#canada-korea-free-trade-agreement)

## [End Use Information](#end-use-information)
The intended use of the [Office Furniture] is for the [Fisheries and Oceans Canada] office in Quebec, QC, and is expected to meet the requirements of the end-user. 

The timeline for this procurement is: 
- Desired delivery date: March 1, 2023

This procurement is a competitive-selective tendering process, open to suppliers who are registered in the Supply Arrangement (SA) #E60PQ-140003/C.

Please refer to the following links for more information and related documents:

* [Tenders and current bids](https://buy
